title: The List of Suspects is Short (Ep 1086)
description:
In this episode, I address the unraveling case of the “whistleblower” and some serious questions we should all be asking about their motives. News Picks:Joe Biden’s team throws Barack Obama under the bus. 

 

Andrew McCabe is panicking. Check out his latest comments.

 

This Politico article from March describes the battle that broke out at the NSC and it may help explain the current whistleblower scenario.

 

Why was Adam Schiff hiring people who worked for the NSC at the White House?

 

California is banning what?

 

You’re not going to believe the latest AOC nonsense.

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
